body_html:
Thanks for bringing this to my attention.
I agree with all your comments @danmane
Markdown changes should be automated, so should be rolled back,
Yes, we want this in 0.12
And yes, we want this also separately merged into master. My preference is to merge it to master before 0.12, but I am not picky about the order.

body:
Thanks for bringing this to my attention.
I agree with all your comments @danmane 
Markdown changes should be automated, so should be rolled back,
Yes, we want this in 0.12
And yes, we want this also separately merged into master. My preference is to merge it to master before 0.12, but I am not picky about the order.
